word_mean: 〔被〕吸附物(体)，吸附质：借吸附作用而附着于表面之物质

sentence.Network_en: The adsorbed gas is the adsorbate.
sentence.Network_cn: 被吸附的气体叫吸附质.

sentence.Network_en: One may also adjust the conditions to monitor the desorption of adsorbate from the catalyst.
sentence.Network_cn: 也可以调节条件以检测催化剂上吸附质的解吸.

sentence.Network_en: Adsorbate bacterins can vary in potency , which affects the level and duration of protection.
sentence.Network_cn: 吸附菌苗在影响保护水平和时间的能力上可能不同.
